channel.title: Coheed & Cambria
channel.description:
So apparently they brought out a new album in April. I was so shocked that it took me this long to realise that they had a new album.
Anyways I've listened to the first five tracks and they are a big disappointment and that's part of the reason why I haven't listened to the whole thing. Just posted to ask if anyone else had the same feeling that it sucked?
I got a 2 hour journey coming up in a bit so I'll listen to the whole of it then but I'm scared I'm gonna be dissapoint.
